鎑字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yè］
［《玉篇》于劫切］
(1)金坚硬。
(2)铁器。
(3)鞍貌。
[②]［tà］
［《五音集韻》吐盍切］
鎑鑪。
[③]［gé］
［《集韻》谷盍切，入盇，見。］
义未详。

鎑字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鎑； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1316第22
【玉篇】于劫切，音葉。【五音集韻】鐵器也。　又他盍切，音榻。鎑鑪。　又【集韻】谷盍切，音䫦。鎑䥈，溫器。　又【五音集韻】魚怯切，音業。鞍䪌貌。

鎑字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鎑字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yè］
["Jade Pian" Yu Jieqie]
(1) Gold is hard.
(2) Ironware.
(3) The appearance of the saddle.
[②]［tà］
["Five Tone Collection Rhyme" spit and cut]
The furnace.
[③]［gé］
["Jiyun" Gu Qiqie, enter Qiu, see. ]
The meaning is unclear.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集上】【金字部】　鎑; Kangxi strokes: 18; Page number: page 1316 22
[Jade articles] Yu Jieqie, Yinye. 【Pentagram rhyme】Ironware.　He cut again, sound couch. The furnace.　[Jiyun] Gu Jianqie, sound 䫦.鎑䥈, thermostat.　[Five-tone Jiyun] Fish cowardly cuts, sound industry. Saddlery appearance.
